events.message: I placed an order two weeks ago and still haven't received any shipping confirmation or tracking number.
The case has been identified as a delivery delay based on the customer's description of a late shipment.
The support case has been routed to the shipping department agent specialized in delayed orders.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. I’m here to help look into the status of your order.
Could you please provide your order number and the email address used when placing the order?
Sure, the order number is 12345678 and the email is customer@example.com.
Thank you for the details. Our system shows a delay due to unforeseen shipping carrier issues, but your package should arrive within 3 business days.
I appreciate the update. I hope it arrives soon, as I need it for an event next week.
I’m escalating your case to our senior logistics team to prioritize your shipment for faster delivery.
The package has now been expedited and is scheduled to be delivered tomorrow. You will receive tracking shortly.
Just checking in to confirm that your order arrived as expected and you are satisfied with the delivery.
Since your order was delivered and no further issues were reported, we are closing this support case. Thank you!
